instruction.value: Apply a 1/2 second burst of spray to buccal folds, followed by patient instructed to swallow several times. Begin procedure after 1 minute.
Apply a 1/2 second burst of spray to each buccal fold, followed by patient instructed to swallow several times. After 30 seconds, insert scope.
Apply no more than 1/2 second burst of spray to each naris. Wait 30 to 60 seconds, then insert transducer.
Apply a 1/2 second burst of spray to each buccal fold, followed by patient instructed to swallow several times. Wait 30 to 60 seconds before initiating procedure.
Apply a 1/2 second burst of spray to affected area. Wait 30 to 60 seconds, then remove arch bar.

additionalnotes.value: Indirect laryngoscopy, head and neck examinations
